Detailed Description

Parameter description class.

This class holds information on Fly3D plugin object parameters. Each class defined in a Fly3D plugin (derived from flyBspObject) can have any number of parameters. Each parameter must have an associated flyParamDesc class describing its data. The flyParamDesc class encloses the parameter's name, type and value, and is very useful in parameter-editing front-ends, like flyEditor.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
